title: New Pool Party Reward vanished.
body:
I played several games today then finished the pool party mission "Fun in the Sun" phase 1.
 It gave me a hextech mystery emote. When I used that I get a emote called Vamporo, a poro with the costume like a vampire. 
After then when I was about to equip that to my emotes stuff. I can't find it anywhere, neither the loot nor the emotes collection tab. I went to the purchase history, it shows every other reward I got before except this one. Did I just get a emote that's unreleased? Feels bad for lost my reward.{{sticker:sg-janna}} 

Player ID: SVE Liberty Walk

replies.body: In my experience emotes, especially ones that are auto redeemed can take a bit to appear in your inventory. Usually restarting your client will do the trick but sometimes there's a wait necessary as well.
